messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet?
The ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that allows users to set poses in ControlNet using a class rewritten from fkunn1326's openpose-editor.
What was added to the ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet on 2024.02.15?
The ability to set background images was added to the ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet on 2024.02.15, thanks to techtruth.
Why does the node have to create new images in the temp folder?
The node has to create new images in the temp folder because the ComfyUI server does not support overwriting files.
What happens to the temp folder when ComfyUI is restarted?
The temp folder is cleared when ComfyUI is restarted.
Which class was used as the basis for the PoseNode in ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet?
The PoseNode in ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet was based on a class rewritten from fkunn1326's openpose-editor, specifically the main.js file.
How can the PoseNode be used in conjunction with other nodes in ComfyUI?
The PoseNode can be used in conjunction with other nodes, such as the TranslateCLIPTextEncodeNode, to translate Russian text to English and set poses in ControlNet.
Where can the workflow.json file for the PoseNode example be downloaded?
The workflow.json file for the PoseNode example can be downloaded from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AlekPet/ComfyUI_Custom_Nodes_AlekPet/master/PoseNode/workflow.json.
